com.bmwcarit.barefoot.matcher

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bmwcarit.barefoot.util.AbstractServer
      • com.bmwcarit.barefoot.matcher.Server

  • public class Server
extends AbstractServer
    Server (stand-alone) for Hidden Markov Model offline map matching. It is a AbstractServer that uses map matching components matcher, state, router, and map; and is configurable via properties files. It can be customized to use arbitrary input and output formats by inheriting and customizing Server.InputFormatter and Server.OutputFormatter classes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Server.DebugJSONOutputFormatter
      Output formatter for writing extensive format of input and output of map matching in a JSON response message.
      static class  Server.GeoJSONOutputFormatter
      Output formatter for writing the geometries of a map matched paths into GeoJSON response message.
      static class  Server.InputFormatter
      Default input formatter for reading a JSON array of MatcherSample objects as input for map matching.
      static class  Server.OutputFormatter
      Default output formatter for writing the JSON representation of a KState object with map matching of the input into a response message.
      static class  Server.SlimJSONOutputFormatter
      Output formatter for writing map matched positions, represented be road id and fraction, and the geometry of the routes into a JSON response message.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.bmwcarit.barefoot.util.AbstractServer

        AbstractServer.ResponseFactory, AbstractServer.ResponseHandler, AbstractServer.RESULT

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server(int portNumber,
              int maxRequestTime,
              int maxResponseTime,
              int maxConnectionCount,
              int numIOThreads,
              int matcherMinInterval,
              double matcherMinDistance,
              RoadMap map,
              Matcher matcher,
              Server.InputFormatter input,
              Server.OutputFormatter output)
        Creates a Server object as stand-alone offline map matching server.
        Parameters:
        portNumber - Port number of the server.
        maxRequestTime - Maximum request waiting time until a timeout is returned.
        maxResponseTime - Maximum response processing time until a timeout is returned.
        maxConnectionCount - Maximum number of connections being accepted by the server.
        numIOThreads - Number of threads for connections (I/O).
        matcherMinInterval - Minimum time interval between samples for being accepted as map matching input.
        matcherMinDistance - Minimum distance between samples for being accepted as map matching input.
        map - RoadMap object with the map to be matched with.
        matcher - Matcher object to be used for map matching (with respective parameterization).
        input - Server.InputFormatter object for input formatting.
        output - Server.OutputFormatter object for output formatting.
